You can still use Bitcomet with Magnet links. Just left click the link the an App window will open up and bitcomet will be in blue and you have the open to make it the default App for Magnet links. Select that and hit OK. Now bitcomet will automatically open and ask you if you want to DL the file every time you click on a magnet link.
Every torrent client can work with magnet links, not only bitcomet!
